name: Survival Diary
description: Survival Diary, a telltale-sandbox game with strong RPG characteristics and based on random events.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 IA-32 Processor: CPU 2.20GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: CPU 2.40GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space
